We are offering a $500 security deposit with your good credit on 1 & 2 bedrooms!!!!  If youâre on the hunt for a modern apartment with historic flair, look no further than the brand new Colony Mill apartments in Keene! Constructed in the mid-1700s, this iconic landmark was once a cornerstone for the textile industry in Cheshire County, and today it is home to 89 beautifully renovated loft apartments that offer the perfect blend of modern convenience and old world charm.    This stunning iconic mill has original details like atriums, floor to ceiling windows, architectural features, original hardwood floors throughout and so much more. Each apartment at Colony Mill has a sleek, modern kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washer/dryer, central A/C and ample closet space. Many units also feature original hardwood flooring and floor-to-ceiling windows that provide scenic views of our cobblestone courtyard, downtown Keene and panoramic mountain views.    Colony Mill also offers a variety of onsite amenities, including fully equipped fitness center, game room, theatre room, and a Wifi Lounge.  Enjoy the nightlife? Residents have direct onsite access to Elm City Brewing Company, NBT Bank, and the Keene Casino.  All this without leaving the convenience of your parking lot. We are offering a $500 security deposit with your good credit on all 1 & 2 bedrooms!!!!  If youâre on the hunt for a modern apartment with historic flair, look no further than the brand new Colony Mill apartments in Keene! Constructed in the mid-1700s, this iconic landmark was once a cornerstone for the textile industry in Cheshire County, and today it is home to 89 beautifully renovated loft apartments that offer the perfect blend of modern convenience and old world charm.    This stunning iconic mill has original details like atriums, floor to ceiling windows, architectural features, original hardwood floors throughout and so much more. Each apartment at Colony Mill has a sleek, modern kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washer/dryer, central A/C and ample closet space. Many units also feature original hardwood flooring and floor-to-ceiling windows that provide scenic views of our cobblestone courtyard, downtown Keene and panoramic mountain views.    Colony Mill also offers a variety of onsite amenities, including fully equipped fitness center, game room, theatre room, and a Wifi Lounge.  Enjoy the nightlife? Residents have direct onsite access to Elm City Brewing Company, NBT Bank, and the Keene Casino.  All this without leaving the convenience of your parking lot.  We are pet friendly community, contact us for complete details on our pet policy.  Owned and professionally managed by Brady Sullivan Properties. https://goshenpond.weebly.com/   Along the Goshen-Ripton Road, about 15 minutes from downtown Brandon and adjacent to the Blueberry Hill Inn is 135 acres of woods, fields and a 12 acre pond.     There are two residences on this property.    One Bedroom ~ Is currently available. Above an unfinished first floor (unfinished but insulated and great for extra living/sleeping space - it is one big room with a bath tub in it!), there is a lovely one bedroom with a modern common room and views looking out on the pond and deck that looks out on the pond.  The building was constructed less than 15 years ago and is bright and very cozy. The rent is $1450/month not including utilities or mowing/snow removal.  Included is also use of the barn and the workshop.  The workshop is perfect for a woodworker and the barn easily houses chickens or ducks.  Perfect for a couple.  And there is FAST internet.  Fiber in Goshen which is very rare and available (at a cost).  This is a very rare and special property.  Log Cabin ~  is currently NOT available as it is currently rented. Set just up the hill from the pond is a 3 bedroom log cabin that has been lovingly restored (new kitchen cabinets, refinished floors, new heating system and wonderful wood stove).  There are 3 small bedrooms upstairs and a half bath. On the first floor is a full bath, eat-in kitchen, living room and office.  The basement has good storage and a washer dryer.  There is a tired tennis court and a working sugar house. The front porch looks out on the pond.  The pond is rimmed by an earthen dam and houses a small island.

Hello, This 1 bedroom apartment is available on January 1st for 2-12 month leases. I have lived here for 3 years while remodeling it- it's in an amazing location. This house is awesome- very quiet part of the neighborhood. You'd be surprised how quiet- no college kids up this end of the street. Housemates downstairs are super friendly, young working professionals. I am including a small laundry setup for this house but it is meant for 1 person and it hooks up to the sink. Screened in porch with bench, lights, hammock (my favorite room). Another porch that isn't screened in that I use for storage.  After the house had $5K worth of insulation added, I had a heat pump installed which keeps your apartment comfy during summer and winter! This unit does your heat during the winter, and you have central A/C during the summer. Average electric bill is $40-50 with proof- and this is your only bill other than internet! Bedroom and living room are very large. Bathroom is not huge, but pretty and recently remodeled. Shower large enough for two people! I just finished the kitchen remodel, including all new stainless appliances, cabinets, backsplash, paint!   PLEASE include some information about yourself and who would be living with you (including pets).  Thank you, Andrew R Owner @ VT Sustainable Real Estate, LLC

For rent: one bedroom apartment adjacent to our 1960s house with 8 acres of gardens and woods.  The woods have trails for snowshoeing and hiking as well as places to sit and a treehouse (great for summer sleeping).      The apartment is small, cozy, and self-contained: 2 rooms and a bathroom, unfurnished, with its own deck.  It is built over the garage and is private, although the entrance hallway/mudroom is shared with the house.  There is garage parking for one car and extra storage areas.  The apartment has its own gas heater, is well insulated, and stays warm and cozy in the winter.  A fan is needed in the summer.    Rent is $800 per month due on the 1st of each month, with a one-time refundable security deposit of $500 due at contract signing.  Optional satellite TV is $25 per month; all other utilities (except phone) are included in the rent.  We have a washer and dryer in the basement of the main house for tenants to use (cost included in the rent) plus lines outdoors for summer drying.   The rent can be reduced to as low as $500 per month for work performed around the property.  Work includes: snow removal using a snowblower or shovel, gardening, hauling, stacking and moving wood, gardening (both flowers and vegetables), etc. Tenants are expected to share in keeping the common areas (garage area and the entryway) clean at all times and taking care of chickens on occasion.  Pets will be considered on a case by case basis.  We are looking for an environmentally friendly (recycling and composting) nonsmoker who is interested in a long term living arrangement. Reliable transportation is necessary since the apartment is located out in the country.  If you feel you would fit well into our homestead please contact us by phone.   We will conduct a brief telephone interview before setting up a time for you to visit.  The apartment is available now.

Bartlett Brook Apartments is located at 1690 Shelburne Road, South Burlington, VT, and is situated on 8.14 beautiful acres. This modern, multi-family apartment complex has five stories, 63-units, is pet-friendly (one dog or cat per apartment), offers high-end finishes, is a completely non-smoking property, has 127 on-grade parking spaces, has been built with the highest level of Efficiency Vermont's energy efficiency High Performance Guidelines. Wired for Burlington Telecom but could be wired for a different service.  This apartment is in a great location, with Oakledge park less than a 10 minute walk away. Small Dog Electronics just moved into the commercial space on the first floor. The new City Market is also a couple minute walk away. There are also other great businesses nearby like Switchback brewery, Zero Gravity brewery, Queen City brewery, Petra Cliffs climbing gym, Crossfit Burlington (less than 5 minute walk), and others.  Dogs and cats are OK with a pet deposit of $250.  Available January 1st 2020 through May 25th 2020 with the option to renew at that time.  Please email or text Matt if you are interested for a showing.

Bartlett Brook Apartments is located at 1690 Shelburne Road, South Burlington, VT, and is situated on 8.14 beautiful acres. This modern, multi-family apartment complex has five stories, 63-units, is pet-friendly (one dog or cat per apartment), offers high-end finishes, is a completely non-smoking property, has 127 on-grade parking spaces, has been built with the highest level of Efficiency Vermont's energy efficiency High Performance Guidelines.  Interior, ground floor amenities include storage units, exercise facilities, complimentary laundry, a dog wash area, bicycle storage/maintenance storage space, and a TV lounge with complimentary Wi-Fi. Exterior amenities include a swimming pool, fire pit, garden beds, and barbecue area.   Bartlett Brook Apartments is only minutes away from Interstate 89 and downtown Burlington in addition to numerous restaurants such as UNO's and The Lake View House Restaurant, grocery stores, banks, pharmacies, indoor entertainment such as movies, bowling, and rock climbing, and outdoor recreation including bicycle and walking paths, parks, and the many water sports and leisure activities afforded by beautiful Lake Champlain.  Bartlett Brook Apartments' studios apartments range from 556-640 s.f. and start at $1,325 per month. Rental prices include all of the amenities as well as heat and hot water. An air conditioning unit is provided, however, the electricity for the apartment, including the AC, is separately metered and at the tenant's expense. A full listing of our apartments and their individual sizes and rental prices can be found at www.BartlettBrook.com. The Bartlett Brook office is open Monday, 2:00 PM - 6:00 PM, Wednesday, 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM, Friday, 9:00 AM - 3:30 PM. Enjoy the comforts and conveniences of living in the City of Burlington!   Located in the active, resurgent Old North End neighborhood, the residences at 219 North Winooski Avenue have been recently renovated to create an exceptional living experience for its tenants.  Each of the four one-bedroom apartments is in immaculate, new condition.  Each apartment has a private entryway and is unique in layout and character.  Significant measures with respect to sound insulation have been incorporated into each apartment, creating an enhanced sense of privacy and tranquility.  With careful thought into energy efficiency, each unit is built with modern amenities complemented by eco-friendly bamboo, tile, and cork flooring throughout with plenty of windows to bring in bright, natural light.  This is a non-smoking building.   Enjoy local amenities including restaurants, coffee shops, abundant retail, recreational activities at various city parks scattered throughout the area, and easy access to Church Street -- all within a short walk from your home.   APT. 2: Available December 17, 2019  This one-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment is located on the first floor and features exposed brick walls. For those who love to cook, this brand-new kitchen includes a modern energy-efficient refrigerator and a gas range/stove with a stainless-steel finish hood. A highly efficient ductless heating/cooling system has been installed for year-round temperature comfort. The unit comes with a washer/dryer.  This is one apartment that is not to be missed!  Monthly rent is $1,450 which includes on-site parking for one car, landscaping, and snow removal. All other utilities (natural gas and electricity) are the responsibility of the tenant. A one-year lease commitment is required. Pets will be considered, with an additional deposit. First month's rent and security deposit required. There is an application process for qualified prospects after showings.  Contact:   Once you have become familiar with the propertyâs location, please contact rentals @ burchfieldcompany. com. Please provide your name, contact information and the best time to reach you, and the property address and unit number you are interested in.
